notesStmt.note: Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

msContents.summary: The order of services knwon as Seder Rav Amram Gaon.

msItem.title: Seder Rav Amram Gaon סדר רב עמרם גאון

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Sefardi square script of the 14th to 15th century. Punctuated.

binding.p: BM in-house. Spine: 'Rab Amram. Siddur. Hebrew. Brit. Mus. Oriental 1067.'
